Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Hofton Avenue between the City Walls and the Avatar Ruins.
Room.LongDescription: Hofton Avenue runs east and west, parallel to the northern City Walls which protect the City of Oceancrest from all kinds of assaults and attacks. On the south side of the road, you can see the mysterious Avatar Ruins, said to be the only remaining reminder of the clash of the avatars.
